name: Aptence Parent Connect
description: Aptence is an edtech platform designed to hone logical, Mathematical and verbal skills among school students. The Platform complements conventional teaching methods and Bridges the gaps in learning in these three key areas tested Consistently in career advancing competitive exams. Students are provided with a personalized online training Program that adapts over time based on performance.  Salient Features  Daily challenges to keep students engaged on a regular basis  Unlimited practice exercises on Logical reasoning, Mathematics and English  Annual certification with rewards for top performers  Performance evaluation dashboard for parents, principals and class teachers   What do the students stand to gain?  Development of ANALYTICAL and CRITICAL THINKING skills  Rigorous practice in LOGICAL REASONING problems on a daily basis  Enhances MATHEMATICAL and VERBAL skills  PAN-India COMPETETIVE feel at an early stage  INCENTIVIZED learning experience, which gives students a chance to earn goodies  SELF PACED learning
